channel.title: CVE Feed for purpleturtlepro -- WooCommerce Etsy Integration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for purpleturtlepro -- WooCommerce Etsy Integration

item.title: CVE-2021-4409|2024-10-23T15:01:09.807Z -- purpleturtlepro -- woocommerce%20etsy%20integration
item.description: The WooCommerce Etsy Integration plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.3.1. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the etcpf_delete_feed() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete an export feed via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
